statements: DELETE FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE id = 1 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM yoga_equipment_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Yoga Mat' OR quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE stock_id = 100 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM yoga_equipment WHERE product_name = 'Yoga Mat' AND category = 'Accessories';
DELETE FROM yoga_blocks WHERE block_quantity > 10 AND block_size = 'Large';
DELETE FROM yoga_mats WHERE price > 50 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE item_type = 'yoga_straps' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
